## arrayFromZodSchema() function

Converts a Zod schema into an array of objects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
arrayFromZodSchema: <S extends z.AnyZodObject>(schema: S) => {
    error: Error;
    value?: undefined;
} | {
    value: {
        key: string;
        default: any;
        description: string;
    }[];
    error?: undefined;
}
```
